name: Shinrin - Forest Art
description:
SUMMARY

In Shinrin you can easily paint/create your own colorful and painterly orthographic forest scenes (dioramas) using 3D brushes.

You can change the size and rotation of each 3D brush and also change the settings of enviroment (Light, Colors, Snow, Wind, etc.) in realtime. If you want you can also use different screen visualization modes (pixelize,kuwahara)

CONTROLS 

LEFT MOUSE: Paint
SCROLL WHEEL: Change 3D brush
RIGHT MOUSE: Change 3D brush group (1. Ground objects, 2. Trees)

1,2,3,4: Change color palette

SHIFT + Mouse: Rotate brush

LEFT CTRL + Mouse: Change brush size

SPACE: Hide settings button

FEATURES

  • Easy to use
  • Create you own forest scenery using beautifully illustrated nature models
  • Customize the enviroment and or visual style.
  • Relaxing procedural ambient soundscape to calm your senses.
